name: CMD Nexus
description: A central hub designed to help CMD students navigate their learning journey through clear structure, tools, and personal insights.

name: Weekly Nerd Blog
description: Each week, I reflected on inspiring sessions from developers, designers, and creatives in the field. These blogs helped me explore different roles in the industry and think about where I see myself as a maker.

name: Browser Technology
description: I designed and build a fully accessible tax form in the visual style of the Dutch Railways (NS). With HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I focused on usability and progressive enhancement making sure it works well on all kinds of devices and browsers.
